title: Replace time/day dropdowns with hour selector and day-of-month input in contact form

requirements.summary: Replace bestTimeToContact dropdown with hour selector allowing clients to choose a specific hour throughout the day in 12-hour or 24-hour format
acceptanceCriteria: The bestTimeToContact field displays as a dropdown or select input with hourly time options
All 24 hours of the day are available as selection options
The selected hour value is captured in the form state
The field is positioned where the current bestTimeToContact dropdown exists in the form

file_operations.description: Replace the bestTimeToContact dropdown field with an hour selector that provides all 24 hours as options in either 12-hour format (1:00 AM through 12:00 AM) or 24-hour format (00:00 through 23:00). Update the select element's options to generate hourly time values dynamically. Ensure the form state captures the selected hour value and the field maintains its current position in the form layout.

requirements.summary: Replace bestDayToContact dropdown with day-of-month input allowing clients to enter or select a specific day (1-31)
acceptanceCriteria: The bestDayToContact field displays as either a number input or dropdown with values 1-31
The selected day value is captured in the form state
The field is positioned where the current bestDayToContact dropdown exists in the form
Input validation ensures only valid day numbers (1-31) can be entered

file_operations.description: Replace the bestDayToContact dropdown field with either a number input (with min=1, max=31) or a select dropdown containing values 1-31. Add input validation to ensure only valid day numbers can be entered or selected. Update the form state to capture the day-of-month value and maintain the field's current position in the form layout.

requirements.summary: Update the useSubmitContactForm mutation hook to submit the new bestTimeToContact and bestDayToContact values to the backend
acceptanceCriteria: The mutation correctly maps the hour selector value to bestTimeToContact field
The mutation correctly maps the day-of-month value to bestDayToContact field
Form submission successfully saves the new time and day format to the backend

file_operations.description: Update the useSubmitContactForm mutation hook to correctly pass the new bestTimeToContact value (specific hour format from the hour selector) and bestDayToContact value (day of month number) to the backend submitContactForm method. Ensure the values are properly formatted as strings when calling the backend method, maintaining compatibility with the existing backend Text field types.

requirements.summary: Update the admin panel submissions table to display bestTimeToContact and bestDayToContact in readable formats
acceptanceCriteria: The bestTimeToContact column displays the hour in a human-readable format (e.g., '2:00 PM' or '14:00')
The bestDayToContact column displays the day number (e.g., '15' or 'Day 15')
Both columns are visible in the submissions table
The data displays correctly for all existing and new submissions

file_operations.description: Update the submissions table to display the bestTimeToContact column showing the specific hour in a human-readable format (e.g., '2:00 PM' or '14:00') and the bestDayToContact column showing the day of month number in a readable format (e.g., '15' or 'Day 15'). Ensure both columns are visible in the table and properly render values from both existing and new submissions.
